SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,TMP.* FROM( SELECT GID, FTR_CDE, FTR_IDN, BUY_NAM, BJD_CDE, DET_ADR, TEL_NUM, SPE_NAM, HOM_PAG, DET_EX1, DET_EX2, DET_EX3, DET_EX4, DET_EX5, SDO_GEOM.SDO_CENTROID(the_geom,0.000001).SDO_POINT.X as point_X, SDO_GEOM.SDO_CENTROID(the_geom,0.000001).SDO_POINT.Y as point_Y, THE_GEOM FROM LFL_SPEC_PS WHERE 1=1
BJD_CDE = #bjdCde#
FTR_CDE = #ftrCde#
SPE_NAM Like '%' ||#speNam#|| '%'
ORDER BY FTR_IDN DESC ) TMP )B WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LFL_SPEC_PS WHERE 1=1
BJD_CDE = #bjdCde#
FTR_CDE = #ftrCde#

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,TMP.* FROM( SELECT GID, FTR_CDE, FTR_IDN, BUY_NAM, BJD_CDE, DET_ADR, TEL_NUM, SPE_NAM, HOM_PAG, DET_EX1, DET_EX2, DET_EX3, DET_EX4, DET_EX5, SDO_GEOM.SDO_CENTROID(the_geom,0.000001).SDO_POINT.X as point_X, SDO_GEOM.SDO_CENTROID(the_geom,0.000001).SDO_POINT.Y as point_Y, THE_GEOM FROM LFL_SPEC_PS WHERE 1=1
FTR_IDN = #ftrIdn#
